name: (island name) Icons
achievementDescription: At Resident Services, we want new ideas for the island flag and island tune. We have Nook Miles in store for those creative types who can redesign and rewrite! It's good to take pride in our island symbols.
achievementCriteria: Awarded for changing your island flag and town tune for the first time.

name: (island name) Miles!
achievementDescription: You traveled a long way just to move to our little island, and you enrolled in the Nook Mileage Program. So you earned your first miles! There are lots of ways to earn miles by just enjoying island life!
achievementCriteria: Unlock the Nook Mileage program

name: Active Island Resident
achievementDescription: Life on the island has lots of promise, hm? To illustrate this, I'll award you some Nook Miles based on the number of active days you've spent here. Please take them and enjoy them.
achievementCriteria: Number of total unique days you've played the game

name: Angling for Perfection!
achievementDescription: Learning how to fish is an essential skill for living on a remote island, hm? Nook Inc. encourages all island residents who are aiming to become fishing masters!
achievementCriteria: Collect a specified number of fish

name: Bell Ringer
achievementDescription: Spending your Bells on the island helps revitalize the local economy, yes, yes! I'll reward you with miles based on how many Bells you've spent.
achievementCriteria: Number of total bells you've spent in shops

name: Birthday Celebration
achievementDescription: Celebrating the birthday of a fellow resident is a wonderful thing. Nook Inc. will commemorate your bond with some party-favor Nook Miles.
achievementCriteria: Number of villager birthdays you've attended

name: Bona Fide Bone Finder!
achievementDescription: Congratulations on finding your first fossil! Of course, you'll need some Nook Miles to commemorate the occasion. But don't celebrate too hard. There are more fossils to dig up! Yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Dig up your first fossil

name: Bug-Off!
achievementDescription: What's the summer event to look forward to? That's right...the Bug-Off! Nook Inc. will give you Nook Miles for participating, so by all means, join the fun!
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you attend a bug-off tourney in each season

name: Bugs Don't Bug Me
achievementDescription: You can earn miles for filling out your Critterpedia! Can you find every bug and unlock every entry? Yes, yes, you can! And please do consider supporting Blathers by donating bugs to the museum.
achievementCriteria: Collect a specified number of unique bugs

name: Bulletin-Board Benefit
achievementDescription: Picture this: Getting Nook Miles from Nook Inc. the first time you write something on an island's bulletin board. Keep using bulletin boards to communicate with everyone on the island! Yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you post a message on your town bulletin board

name: Cast Master
achievementDescription: Cast your line carefully if you want to reel in this rewardâ€”you'll need to nab a bunch of fish in a row without a single one getting away to earn these miles.
achievementCriteria: Fish a specified number of fish in a single streak without any getting away

name: Cicada Memories
achievementDescription: Ah, cicada shells in the summer. They're not really all that useful, but collecting them does help create summer memories that will last a lifetime.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you catch a cicada shell

name: Clam and Collected
achievementDescription: Dig up clams, collect Nook Miles. It's really that simple. The real bonus here is that you get to walk along the beach for this one.
achievementCriteria: Dig up a specified number of clams

name: Come Home to the Roost
achievementDescription: The Roost, located on the second floor of the museum, is quite picky about the coffee they serve, yes, yes! Do stop in to enjoy a cup and earn some dark-roasted miles!
achievementCriteria: Number of days you've gotten coffee from Brewster

name: Cornering the Stalk Market
achievementDescription: The powers that be have been tracking your turnip transactions...and let's just say you've harvested your share of profits! Enjoy a few Nook Miles for helping contribute to the island's economy.
achievementCriteria: Number of total bells you've profited from selling turnips

name: Countdown Celebration
achievementDescription: The only thing better than ringing in the new year is ringing in the new year with some Nook Miles! May you live to see many moreâ€”years and miles!
achievementCriteria: Awarded for attending the new year holiday event

name: Custom Design Pro!
achievementDescription: You upgraded to the Pro version of the Custom Design app, hm? That makes you a fine Pro Custom Designer. Yes, yes! I'll reward you with Nook Miles to commemorate your Pro debut!
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you use the Custom Design pro app to edit or create a design

name: DIY Furniture
achievementDescription: Here's a win-win-win situation: Craft your own furniture. (Win!) Enjoy your handiwork. (Win!) Earn Nook Miles for the furniture you've crafted. (Win!) What could be better than that?
achievementCriteria: Craft a specified number of DIY furniture

name: DIY Tools
achievementDescription: If your tools break, just make more! And to take away the sting, you'll earn Nook Miles based on the number of tools you craft. Sweet deal!
achievementCriteria: Craft a specified number of tools

name: Decorated Decorator
achievementDescription: You got an S ranking from the Happy Home Academy! Your decorating skills are truly an inspiration, and you deserve some Nook Miles.
achievementCriteria: Get an S ranking from the Happy Home Academy

name: Deep Dive
achievementDescription: The glittering sea that surrounds our island is home to all kinds of captivating creatures. Put on your wet suit, dive in, and sea what you can collect to earn miles. Sea what I did there, hm?
achievementCriteria: Collect a specified number of sea creatures

name: Dream House
achievementDescription: A home that you build yourself gives you greater livabilityâ€”it's on a whole other level! I'll give Nook Miles to those who build or expand their home to taste the good life.
achievementCriteria: Expand your home a specified number of times

name: Edit Credit
achievementDescription: Your passport has some information you can edit! Nook Inc. will give Nook Miles to folks who customize their profiles. Take it slow, think about it, and make it your own.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you edit your passport.

name: Executive Producer
achievementDescription: Nothing feels quite like harvesting produce that you grew by the sweat of your brow, yes, yes! Now go enjoy the fruits of your laborâ€”and the pumpkins, carrots, sugarcane, and potatoes too!
achievementCriteria: Harvest a specified number of produce

name: Exterior Decorator
achievementDescription: You can display furniture outside, right? Well, here's a little incentive for you to show off what you've gotâ€”you'll earn Nook Miles based on the number of furniture items you set up outside.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you place some furniture outside

name: Faint of Heart
achievementDescription: This island is home to creepy crawlers that would make anyone light-headed. Maybe wielding a net will make you less likely to faint...
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you get knocked out by a Scorpion or Tarantula

name: Faked Out!
achievementDescription: Oh my. Did you get hoodwinked? That work of art you tried to donate turned out to be a forgery, and it stings. Your eye for art is being tested! Yes, yes! Please take some comfort in the miles I'm giving you.
achievementCriteria: Donated a fake piece of art

name: First Custom Design!
achievementDescription: Learning to use the Custom Design app lets you personalize your clothes and furniture. So much fun to be had, yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you use the Custom Design app to edit or create a design

name: First-Time Buyer
achievementDescription: You won't get miles every time you buy something on the island, but your first time is special! Enjoy these miles, courtesy of Nook Inc.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you purchase an item from a shop

name: Fishing Tourney!
achievementDescription: Please participate in the Fishing Tourney, which is held every spring, summer, fall, and winter! I'll give you Nook Miles as a reward the first time you participate each season.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you attend a fishing tourney in each season

name: Flea Flicker
achievementDescription: Itchy fleas are a real hassle. If you see an island buddy struggling with fleas, by all means, help them out. Not only is it a nice thing to do, but you'll also get some miles for doing a good deed.
achievementCriteria: Number of times you've caught fleas off a villager

name: Flower Power
achievementDescription: Planting flowers makes our island more beautiful and can earn you miles. So...grow wild! Yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Plant a specified number of flower seeds (digging up and replanting existing flowers does not count)

name: Flower Tender
achievementDescription: If you encourage floral growth by showering the island's flowers with water, I'll encourage your growth by showering you with Nook Miles!
achievementCriteria: Water a specified number of flowers

name: Fossil Assessment
achievementDescription: Yes, yes! You're getting Nook Miles based on the number of fossils you've had assessed. Dig up as many as you can and find out what they are!
achievementCriteria: Have Blathers assess a specified number of fossils

name: Fruit Roots
achievementDescription: (island name)'s local fruit delicacy is a wonder, to be sure. But if you plant new varieties, guess what'll happen? Correct! You'll "grow" some Nook Miles! What you do with the fruit after that is up to you.
achievementCriteria: Plant each type of fruit (cherry, orange, pear, peach, apple, and coconut)

name: Fun with Fences
achievementDescription: You can have a wonderful yard in no time by building a fence and surrounding your home or garden. Yes, yes! Nook Inc. will award Nook Miles to skilled fence installers.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you place a fence

name: Furniture Freshener
achievementDescription: Give your furniture that personal touch and you can unlock miles. The more items you refurbish, the more miles you can get, hm?
achievementCriteria: Customize a specified number of furniture or tools using the workbench

name: Go Ahead. Be Shellfish!
achievementDescription: You can earn Nook Miles based on the number of seashells you sell. (That's not easy to say!) And remember: You'll get different amounts of Bells for different types of shells. So pay attention!
achievementCriteria: Sell a specified number of seashells

name: Golden Milestone
achievementDescription: If your tools are glinting gold, your account will be bursting with Bells soon enough. The paths to these tools are varied and secret, but you will have earned some Nook Miles for collecting them all.
achievementCriteria: Awarded for each unique golden tool you've equipped (shovel, net, fishing rod, watering can, axe, and slingshot)

name: Good Things in Store!
achievementDescription: I'll reward you with miles based on the number of items you have in storage, hm? Using the convenient storage feature will make life on the island more pleasant!
achievementCriteria: Store a specified number of items in your house storage

name: Greedy Weeder
achievementDescription: Nook Inc. salutes you for your beautification efforts. Nook Inc. rewards you with Nook Miles for selling weeds. Nook Inc. is quite generous, no?
achievementCriteria: Sell a specified number of weeds

name: Growing Collection
achievementDescription: You are aware that furniture and clothing you buy is added to your Nook Shopping catalog, yes? Were you also aware that you can earn miles for a large catalog? Well, you certainly are aware now!
achievementCriteria: Number of unique furniture pieces you've added to your catalog

name: Gulliver's Travails
achievementDescription: When you come across someone in trouble on the beach, you help them, setting a fine example for all the island residents. Such kindness will surely find its way back to you.
achievementCriteria: Number of times you've helped Gulliver fix his communicator

name: Gyroid Getter
achievementDescription: Collect different kinds of gyroids, and earn miles in return! I suspect once you experience life in their presence, you'll find it hard to resist hunting for more, hm?
achievementCriteria: Touch specified number of unique gyroids

name: Happy Birthday!
achievementDescription: Happy birthday to you! Take some Nook Miles, woo-hoo! Happy birthday to you-oo! Take some Nook Miles, woo-hoo! (Get yourself something nice.)
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you play on your character's birthday

name: Have a Nice DIY!
achievementDescription: Nook Inc. will award Nook Miles for the number of DIY recipes you've collected. Think about that. You're earning...for learning! Yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Collect a specified number of DIY recipes

name: Hoard Reward
achievementDescription: Put more furniture in your house! Nook Inc. will give you Nook Miles based on the number of indoor furniture items you have. So you're earning rewards for making your house a home!
achievementCriteria: Place a specified number of furniture in your house

name: Host the Most
achievementDescription: To encourage you to invite plenty of guests to the island, we're offering miles as an incentive. The more the merrierâ€” and that goes for Nook Miles too!
achievementCriteria: Number of other players that have visited your island

name: Island Designer
achievementDescription: At Nook Inc. we encourage the use of the Island Designer app to liven up the island. We're giving away miles the first time you use a permit for a path, river, or cliff!
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you use the Island Designer app to place a path, add/remove water, and build/destroy a cliff

name: Island Ichthyologist
achievementDescription: Fill in your Critterpedia with fish and earn miles along the way. Can you categorize each and every type of fish that swims in your island's waters, hm?
achievementCriteria: Collect a specified number of unique fish

name: Island Shutterbug
achievementDescription: Congratulations on taking your first island photo! Please do show off your wonderful photos, whether they're impulse snaps or brilliant compositions.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you take a photo using the camera app on the NookPhone (screenshot button does not count, must use the app)

name: Island Togetherness
achievementDescription: One of the goals of Nook Inc. is resident togetherness. Our gregarious-greetings initiative aims to reward you with Nook Miles just for chatting with residents. Try to talk to all your neighbors every day!
achievementCriteria: Talk to each one of your villagers every day

name: Island and Yourland
achievementDescription: Support your neighboring islands with a visit now and again. The more you visit, the more Nook Miles you can earn! Here at Nook Inc. we like to reward your adventurous spirit, hm?
achievementCriteria: Number of times you've visited another player's island (does not count mystery islands using Nook Miles Tickets)

name: It's Raining Treasure!
achievementDescription: No one knows who sends the gifts attached to balloons to our island, but you can earn miles by shooting them down and collecting what's inside.
achievementCriteria: Number of balloons you've shot down with a slingshot

name: K.K. Mania
achievementDescription: K.K. supports our island with his groovy brand of folk rock, so we should support him! The more K.K. shows you attend, the more Nook Miles you can earn.
achievementCriteria: Number of K.K. shows you've attended

name: Lost Treasure
achievementDescription: Oh my. You popped a balloon with a skillful shot, but the attached prize fell into the water! Maybe some Nook Miles will help you recover from that sunken feeling, hm?
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time a balloon present you shot lands in a body of water

name: Making a Change
achievementDescription: A closet is a must-have item for a fashion trendsetter. I'll offer Nook Miles to anyone who has a closet and changes outfits, thereby increasing the chances of an island fashion trend catching on.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you use a wardrobe to change your character's outfit

name: Miles for Stalkholders
achievementDescription: I have Nook Miles to give to any resident who purchases turnips. Buy them low, sell them high, and make a handsome profit! They'll rot in a week, though, so be careful.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you purchase turnips

name: Mmm-Mmm-Miles!
achievementDescription: Gathering ingredients and creating delicious treats is great fun, is it not? Yes, yes, I do believe our chefs out there deserve miles for all the times they've prepared something delicious!
achievementCriteria: Cook a specified number of foods

name: Moving Fees Paid!
achievementDescription: Thank you for paying all your fees for moving to the island! Take a Nook Miles rebate as a gift and give yourself a nice pat on the back, hm?
achievementCriteria: Awarded when you pay off your initial loan using Nook Miles

name: Netting Better!
achievementDescription: It's so impressive when someone can catch five wasps in a rowâ€”so impressive, in fact, that you'll earn some Nook Miles if you can do it!
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you catch five wasps in a row without running away or getting stung

name: Nice to Meet You, Gyroid!
achievementDescription: You've discovered your first gyroid! This special occasion deserves miles, yes, yes. I hope you feel inspired to collect all sorts of different, wonderful gyroids now.
achievementCriteria: Dig up your first gyroid

name: No More Loan Payments!
achievementDescription: You see how this works? You pay off your loan, you get some Nook Miles! Thank you for doing business with Nook Inc.!
achievementCriteria: Awarded after paying off your first house loan with bells

name: Nook Miles for Miles!
achievementDescription: Earning Nook Miles for earning Nook Miles? Yes, yes! You just earned miles for finishing Nook Miles+ goals! But where will it end?
achievementCriteria: Number of Nook Miles+ goals you've completed

name: NookPhone Life
achievementDescription: Gotten used to using your NookPhone? The fact that you're reading this probably means you have! Keep using it, and enjoy some Nook Miles just for getting familiar with it.
achievementCriteria: Awarded after the 10th time you open your NookPhone

name: Overcoming Pitfalls
achievementDescription: Life is full of peaks and valleys, hills and pits. When you fall into a pit, you learn a lesson, hm? Be more careful next time, yes? Don't feel too bad, though. You're getting some bonus Nook Miles for your fall.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you fall into a pitfall hole

name: Paydirt!
achievementDescription: I'll bet you didn't think you'd find buried Bells here, hm? But this is an island, after all. Buried treasure and whatnot. Enjoy some Nook Miles from Nook Inc. to celebrate your discovery.
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you dig up bells from a shining spot

name: Pick of the Bunch
achievementDescription: You'll get Nook Miles based on the amount of fruit you've sold. Remember: If you sell our island's specialty fruits on other islands, you might be able to get a better price!
achievementCriteria: Sell a specified number of fruits

name: Pit-y Party
achievementDescription: Enjoy some bonus Nook Miles to commemorate the creation of your first pit. Just make sure you don't fall victim to your own handiwork!
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you bury a pitfall seed

name: Popular Pen Pal
achievementDescription: I'll reward you with miles if you send a lot of letters. Please keep sending letters to everyone and continuing to deepen friendships. Yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Number of letters you've sent

name: Reaction Ruler
achievementDescription: You learned a Reaction! Let's celebrate this momentous occasion with...Nook Miles, hm? Reactions help you express yourself, so it's a good idea to learn them.
achievementCriteria: Learn a specified number of reactions

name: Remarkable Remodeler
achievementDescription: You finished remodeling your house, hm? It looks like a completely new house now! I'll give you rewards based on the number of remodels you do, so keep it up!
achievementCriteria: Remodel your home's exterior a specified number of times

name: Rock-Splitting Champ
achievementDescription: You hit a single rock eight times in a row and knocked some things loose. But did you know that rock whacking is the activity that keeps on giving? Yes, yes! You're getting some Nook Miles now!
achievementCriteria: Hit a rock with your shovel and obtain all 8 materials from that rock

name: Rough-hewn
achievementDescription: Island development is Nook Inc.'s goal. We need a lot of materials to make that happen, so we're giving away Nook Miles based on how much wood you've chopped from trees.
achievementCriteria: Chop a specified number of wood from trees

name: Seller of Unwanted Stuff
achievementDescription: Selling things you don't need is a great way to keep down the clutter and earn a few extra Bells. And, in this case, a few extra miles! Hooray for your first sale!
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you sell an item to a shop

name: Set Sail for Adventure
achievementDescription: Rare items and exciting adventures are yours when you head out on a special tour with a veteran sailor, yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Number of times you've gone on a Kapp'n tour

name: Shady Shakedown
achievementDescription: Rumor has it that someone on this island likes to hide furniture in trees. Yes, yes! I'll give you Nook Miles based on the number of furniture items you shake out of trees. So get out there and shake!
achievementCriteria: Number of furniture pieces you've found from shaking trees

name: Shop to It
achievementDescription: Living on a remote island doesn't mean you have to go without life's luxuries. Shop to your heart's content with Nook Shopping and you'll earn Nook Miles!
achievementCriteria: Number of times you've ordered from the Nook Shopping catalog

name: Shrubbery Hubbubbery
achievementDescription: Different kinds of shrubs usher in the different seasons with their flowers, yes, yes! Folks who plant many shrubs will receive beauty and miles as a reward.
achievementCriteria: Plant a specified number of shrubs (replanting existing shrubs does not count)

name: Smile Isle
achievementDescription: Good deeds are their own rewards. But go ahead and have some Nook Miles too for fulfilling requests from other island residents. Yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Fulfill a specified number of requests from residents (such as returning lost items)

name: Snowmaestro
achievementDescription: What's this? You get Nook Miles based on how many quality snowfolks you've built? That's a pretty good deal for just having a little fun in the snow.
achievementCriteria: Number of perfect snow-people you've built

name: Sprout Out Loud
achievementDescription: Plant your produce starts across the whole island for a fresh, bounteous crop! Whether it's a small home garden or a full-on field, support Nook Inc. with all your produce-planting power! Yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Plant a specified number of produce sprouts (replanting existing sprouts does not count)

name: Stretch to Refresh!
achievementDescription: The health of our residents is a top priority, yes, yes! So we're holding group-stretching sessions in the plaza. I'll provide miles once per day for participating, and there will be a tape deck for music. I hope I see you there!
achievementCriteria: Number of days you've participated in group stretching

name: Taking the Sting Out
achievementDescription: Getting stung by wasps hurts! Getting stung again before you can recover makes you faint! But at least you get some miles for that. I don't want you to be uncomfortable, though, so take some medicine to heal up!
achievementCriteria: Awarded the first time you get stung by a wasp

name: That's One Smart Phone
achievementDescription: Nothing makes a smartphone manufacturer happier than a user who gets the most out of the device. At least, that's how Nook Inc. feels about the NookPhone. So we're giving you miles just for using your phone!
achievementCriteria: Awarded after the 1000th time you open your NookPhone

name: Tomorrow's Trees Today
achievementDescription: To build a sustainable life on this island, we're going to need to plant a lot of trees! The more you plant, the more miles you can earn.
achievementCriteria: Plant a specified number of trees (planting fruits or replanting existing trees does not count)

name: Trash Fishin'
achievementDescription: You work extra hard to keep our island clean, even going so far as to fish up trash out of our lovely waters. So you're getting some Nook Miles for keeping the island extra tidy, yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Fish a specified number of trash (cans, tires, or boots)

name: Trashed Tools
achievementDescription: Using a tool until it breaks is proof of your hard work! In praise of your good deeds, you're getting Nook Miles based on how many tools you've broken.
achievementCriteria: Break a specified number of tools

name: True Friends
achievementDescription: It's good news for Nook Inc. when island residents get along. Good relationships are a cornerstone of island development!
achievementCriteria: Number of villagers you've become good friends with

name: True Patron of the Arts
achievementDescription: Collecting artwork contributes to the cultural quality of (island name), and Nook Inc. will give miles to folks who prove themselves discerning connoisseurs.
achievementCriteria: Number of times you've purchased art that turned out to be real

name: Underwater Understudy
achievementDescription: There are still many creatures we have yet to discover at the bottom of the sea, hm? Earn miles by diving deep, capturing creatures, and filling out your Critterpedia. Yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Collect a specified number of unique sea creatures

name: Wishes Come True
achievementDescription: Were you wishing for Nook Miles the last time you saw a shooting star? Hm? Because Nook Inc. is here to grant your wish. More wishes, more miles! Yes, yes!
achievementCriteria: Number of shooting stars you've wished on

name: Wispy Island Secrets
achievementDescription: If you happen to encounter one of the island's secrets, maybe just keep it to yourself. We don't want to scare anyone away from here. Pretty sure that's in your island contract...
achievementCriteria: Number of times you've helped Wisp find the parts of his spirit

name: Writing a Cookbook?
achievementDescription: The recipes in your collection could stretch for miles, so allow me to present you with these...miles! Delight the eyes and stomachs of your neighbors with all your delicious creations, hm?
achievementCriteria: Learn a specified number of cooking DIY recipes

name: You Otter Know
achievementDescription: If you meet a laid-back fellow floating in the sea, consider sharing some of your scallops with him. You never know what you might learn in return...and a little gift never hurts either!
achievementCriteria: Number of times you've given scallops to Pascal

name: You've Got the Bug
achievementDescription: Earn miles just for catching creepy-crawlies! Every bug you catch is one that won't be surprising someone in their sock drawer.
achievementCriteria: Collect a specified number of bugs
